parameters.name: ConfigId
parameters.description: Configuration ID. Can be obtained by calling the [ListImageTransforms](~~2869056~~) interface.

parameters.name: ConfigType
PageNumber
parameters.description: Page number. The default value is 1 if not provided.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page. The maximum value is 500, and the default value is 500 if not provided.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: Rule name. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID. Can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) interface.

parameters.name: SiteVersion
parameters.description: Site version number. For sites with version management enabled, you can use this parameter to specify the site version for which the configuration takes effect. The default value is version 0.
